display_long_description:
# Experience the delight of Hello, Dot – one of the world's first interactive mixed-reality toys, available free!

Admire your stunning Peridot up close and develop that special bond with them through adorable interactions.

[media]

Imagine hooking your hands under your Dot’s arms to pick them up – tossing them gently and letting them float back into your embrace. Or, dance to your favorite song and relax on the couch snuggled up together. The possibilities are endless, and the joy you’ll feel is REAL.

But the playful adventures don't stop there! Discover a whimsical arcade contraption in your room, packed with delightful activities! Can't find it? Clap three times & it magically appears! Pull the lever for fun minigames: rewarding Play Dates, intense Dotball, or Eating Contests! Earn currency for adorable outfits & fun items, letting your Dot’s personality shine.

And for the ultimate personal touch, unleash your creativity with our Gen AI-powered customizer: just grab the mic, describe your imagined look (fiery pattern? starry coat?), and watch the magic paintbucket bring it to life!

This heartwarming journey is just the start. As you play and connect, you're exploring the future of companionship – discovering the magic that unfolds when digital friends begin to truly understand us.

Credits: Aaron Desin, Alicia Berry, Anika Benons, Ashley Rosenbaum, Asim Ahmed, Carrie Sloane, David Hollin, Jessica Jung, Loren Sherman, Luis Tolosa, Nathan Pannell, Remi Sparks, Shan Jiang, Will Jackson
